name: Slimestone Quarry
description:
Slimes do best where its cold, wet, and miserable! Solve puzzles as slimes that can combine together and split apart, and try and reach the bottom of Slimestone Quarry! This is an easy-going platformer game meant to be completed in one sitting, made for the Blackthornprod Gamejam #3 in a week. The theme of Less is More, you can make Less overall slimes by combining them, but the combined slimes are More useful. If you tried it, let me know what you thought with a comment!

______________________________

Controls:

Z to switch between slimes
SPACEBAR to split slimes
ESC for pause menu
(pause to restart the level if you messed up!)

______________________________

Credits:

Art, Coding, Music, Sounds: pipotchi (me)

______________________________

To fulfil the theme, I went with multiple weak slimes that could combine. The less units you control, the stronger and heavier they are.
